feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:06 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 08:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -21.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
